name: Mark's
address: Mark's, Kingsgate Mall, 370 E Broadway Unit 117, Vancouver, BC V5T 4G5

featured_reviews.review_id: This was my first visit to Mark's,  and I was pleasantly surprised.  The staff was professional and kind and the product selection was  terrific.   I got a great pair of rubber boots at a reasonable price, and they will last for years. I would recommend Mark's to everyone.
featured_reviews.review_text: This was my first visit to Mark's,  and I was pleasantly surprised.  The staff was professional and kind and the product selection was  terrific.   I got a great pair of rubber boots at a reasonable price, and they will last for years. I would recommend Mark's to everyone.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Scammers !! Poor Management !! Very bad experience today

Don't even try to sign up for their rewards card or program, they scammed us to offer rewards program and ended up signing up for their Mastercard. This is the employee that did this, she should be fired first. She offered us a rewards card to get a 15% off. She asked us our ID card, we gave and she did a credit check, opened a Mastercard in our name without our consent. She filed all fake info by herself, she did the authorize and submitted it. The so called "manager" on the side is her friend, she said she couldn't do anything. Don't ever go to these scammers. I'm complaining a law suit against these scammers.  She is being doing this to all of their customers. This should be stopped.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Went to look to see what kind of Rain Coats they had in stocks. I ended up getting a Windriver Rain Coat with a Hood for $120.00. It will keep me dry now when I'm waking the dog in the rain.
Staff was really polite and respectful. I asked her if she could cut the tags off, which she did for me. GoodcService and Friendly Staff.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I am not reviewing this location but Mark's ONLINE. I bought a pair of shoes that I had to exchange for a different size. So far so good, Mark's even refunded the $ 8.00 freight. Next I printed the return instructions which clearly say , " due to cleaning procedures we are experiencing delays, processing may take UPTO 10 business days"
Today, the 14th business day, after Can Post delivered my return, I phoned customer service and inquired about my refund.
The answer I received was  "It can take 30 days before processing your refund" When I protested and mentioned the "10 days" in the return instructions. I was told "if that's true can you email us a copy because that is "typing" mistake.  Really, a typing mistake on a preprinted automated return form ??? The moral of the story : if you are looking for a refund in a hurry Mark's is NOT the place to shop!

UPDATE:  October 16.
Called again today and was told it would be 30 BUSINESS days i.e.  6 weeks!!  Think about it before you decide to do your online Christmas shopping at Marks online.... 6 weeks for a refund! That is after I paid good money to express mail the parcel back to them.

featured_reviews.review_id: Yeah i should have read the reviews before coming in that store. Poor customer service! The worst marks store. Horrible manager named alex. I got treated like a scammer
featured_reviews.review_text: Yeah i should have read the reviews before coming in that store. Poor customer service! The worst marks store. Horrible manager named alex. I got treated like a scammer

featured_reviews.review_id:
Hello All....
I had very BAD experience at this Location...
I went there on wednesday to shop for shoes but didn't buy anything because of staff being specific- the girl with long hair and Name Tag "DILPREET".
I was having trouble to find Shoes and she was working in that area, she even looked at me but she was on phone and talking loudly all the time, she didn't even help me out and kept doing whatever she was doing.
I don't know if her Manager knows about this.. what are they getting paid for... God Nows
Very poor customer service.
Very Disappointing....
Will Never Go there Again...
If Manager is reading all these Reviews... Please have a chat with her about how to deal with customers... I will be glad to hear back....

featured_reviews.review_id: Clean, neat and nice store, good place to get  work apparel at affordable prices. A young employee, help me until I get the product I was looking for.
featured_reviews.review_text: Clean, neat and nice store, good place to get  work apparel at affordable prices. A young employee, help me until I get the product I was looking for.

featured_reviews.review_id: This is a busy Mark's, no question, but the staff was friendly and worked hard to move the line while giving each customer personalized service.  The male staff member at the counter even seemed to go over and above, calling a cross-city Mark's to check if that store had an item which a customer wanted.  When it came my turn, he thanked me for my patience and assured me he'd get me moving soon.  I liked that.  I was happy as well with the money I saved today.  $20 bucks off a pair of non-slip Sketchers for the workplace, plus an additional $8 off for joining Mark's online community (they send you a coupon)... basically left the store paying $75 tax included for a pretty decent pair of work shoes, normally $99 plus tax.   All in all, well worth the trip to Kingsgate Mall!
